item.title: Air travel
item.content: • Up to 13% discount for "Aeroflot" business class flights • Confidential tariffs for British Airways and Emirates flights • 15% discount for S7 business class flights

item.title: PRIME Hotel Collection
item.content: • Increasing of room category • Early check-in and late check-out • Free breakfast • Compliments: lunch or dinner at the hotel restaurant • Spa-procedures for the amount of $ 100 (In some networks) • A traditional gift from the hotel
